item.title: Declaration format
item.description: Terms declaration format reference Terms are declared in a service declaration file, under the terms property. Most of the time, terms are written in only one source document (for example Facebook Terms of Service) but sometimes terms can be spread across multiple online source documents, and their combination constitutes the terms (for example Facebook Community Guidelines).
